Application: Suitable for desiccation, medical treatment and poultry artificial incubation.
sentences.cn: 用途: 干燥 、 医疗和家禽人工孵化.

sentences.en: Desiccation The drying out of an organism due to evaporation.
sentences.cn: 干燥(脱水):由于蒸发而干燥的生物体.

sentences.en: It is possible on penetrating keratoplasty with preserved corneas by desiccation in clinical use.
sentences.cn: 提示:在临床上,干燥保存角膜有可能作为穿透角膜移植材料应用.

sentences.en: Provided to and mining enterprises , laboratories and scientific research institutes for desiccation, torrefaction, wax - melting and sterilization.
sentences.cn: 供工矿企业、化验室、科研单位等作干燥 、 烘焙熔蜡、灭菌作用,高温老化测试.

sentences.en: Spores normally resist desiccation and have many ordinary procedures of disinfection.
sentences.cn: 芽孢能抗干燥并且有很多普通的消毒方法.

sentences.en: The film block design utilize special mixed desiccation to get off water and acid.
sentences.cn: 模制块状设计利用了特殊混合的干燥剂灭很好的去除水份和酸.

sentences.en: The lakes may have undergone numerous episodes of inundation, evaporation ( and possibly freezing ), and desiccation.
sentences.cn: 这些湖泊可能经历过很多次泛滥 、 蒸发 ( 甚至冻结 ) 及乾涸.

sentences.en: They are there to protect the seed - and the germinating seedling - from desiccation and physical harm.
sentences.cn: 这些外壳能保护种子 --- 以及正在发芽的幼苗 --- 不失掉水分以及免于其它的物理上的破坏.

sentences.en: When the low water - cement ratio gets off, concrete self - desiccation shrinkage produces easily.
sentences.cn: 低水灰比下, 混凝土的自缩现象很容易发生,从而加大了混凝土开裂的可能性.

trans.tran_en: the process of becoming completely dry
